title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of cats in millions, with a total of 9 data points.
Overall Number of cats in millions has increased over the Year
Number of cats in millions is slightly constant from 2000 to 2017.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2002 and 2004.
Max Number of cats in millions about 95.6 was recorded at Year 2013
Min Number of cats in millions about 73.0 was recorded at Year 2000
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of cats in millions, with a total of 9 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2000 to 2004.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
Correspondingly, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2013.
Similarly, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2011.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2006 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2004 to 2006.
